oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Kelly Field, Chickamauga Park
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Brown-toned photograph of the Wisconsin Monument and others along a road at Chickamauga & Chattanooga National Military Park. Features two borders and an undivided back. There is a handwritten address and a January 28, 1907 postmark on reverse. This postcard comes from the Catherine Berry Pilcher Avery Papers Collection.
oai_dc:dc.dc:coverage: Chickamauga & Chattanooga National Military Park (Ga. And Tenn.); Chickamauga Battlefield (Ga.); Fort Oglethorpe (Ga.); Walker County (Ga.)
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: National parks & reserves; Monuments & memorials; Roads
